thread.title: Man shot after allegedly breaking into several vehicles in Kansas City
thread.title_full: Man shot after allegedly breaking into several vehicles in Kansas City

author: Nick Sloan
title: Man shot after allegedly breaking into several vehicles in Kansas City
text:
Man shot after allegedly breaking into several vehicles in Kansas City Share Copy Link Copy {copyShortcut} to copy Updated: 4:01 PM CDT Apr 9, 2025 Nick Sloan Digital Content Producer
KMBC police lights SOURCE: KMBC Advertisement Man shot after allegedly breaking into several vehicles in Kansas City Share Copy Link Copy {copyShortcut} to copy Updated: 4:01 PM CDT Apr 9, 2025 Nick Sloan Digital Content Producer A man was shot early Wednesday in Kansas City after allegedly breaking into multiple vehicles.Kansas City police responded to a shooting call around 5:15 a.m. near 19th Street and Cleveland Avenue.Officers said the shooting victim matched the description of a suspect seen breaking into about 30 vehicles in the 2700 block of Askew Avenue.According to police, a man confronted the suspect and shot him.The victim suffered injuries that were not life-threatening. KANSAS CITY, Mo. â€” A man was shot early Wednesday in Kansas City after allegedly breaking into multiple vehicles.
Kansas City police responded to a shooting call around 5:15 a.m. near 19th Street and Cleveland Avenue.
Advertisement Officers said the shooting victim matched the description of a suspect seen breaking into about 30 vehicles in the 2700 block of Askew Avenue.
According to police, a man confronted the suspect and shot him.
The victim suffered injuries that were not life-threatening.
